summary: Executes SCIP solver with constraints from 'converted.mps', limits time to 30 seconds and sets it to find only one solution, optimizes the model, writes relaxed solution to 'relaxed_scip.sol', then quits.

details.comment: Executes SCIP solver with constraints from 'converted.mps', limits time to 30 seconds and sets it to find only one solution, optimizes the model, writes relaxed solution to 'relaxed_scip.sol', then quits.
details.content: scip -c "read converted.mps" -c "set limits solutions 1" -c "set limits time 30" -c "change minuc" -c "optimize" -c "write solution relaxed_scip.sol" -c "quit"
